org.educraft.item

Class MathsWand

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.item.Item
      • net.minecraft.item.ItemSword
        • org.educraft.item.MathsWand

  • public class MathsWand
extends net.minecraft.item.ItemSword
    A Maths Wand is used to obtain numbers by killing the skeletons and zombies defined in org.educraft.entity.
